title: Perform a CFD Analysis
description: An aerodynamicist needs to run a Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulation to analyze airflow over a new winglet design.

tasks.description: Create a mesh (a grid of points) around the 3D model of the winglet for the simulation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a high-quality mesh suitable for CFD.

tasks.description: Set up the simulation conditions, including airspeed, altitude (air density), and turbulence model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly defines all simulation parameters.

tasks.description: Run the CFD simulation and analyze the results to determine the winglet's effectiveness at reducing induced drag.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the simulation and the results show a 4% reduction in drag.
